summary: The 'Parity in Engineering Act' (H.R. 3258) aims to amend Title 23 of the United States Code concerning contracting for engineering and design services for infrastructure projects. Specifically, it addresses the exclusion of Minnesota from certain contracting requirements. The bill's intent is to create parity by removing Minnesota's specific exclusion and revising the included states. It was introduced in the House of Representatives on May 7, 2025.
